title:
Talking Point: Defence vs Sociedad

attachments.displayName:
Talking Point: Defence vs Sociedad

David Moyes has some thinking to do as he ponders the make-up of his defence for United’s next game, against Real Sociedad in the Champions League on Tuesday.

Rafael and Jonny Evans will need to be assessed after coming off injured at half-time against Fulham on Saturday. Evans was replaced by Chris Smalling, who performed admirably in the second period.

Skipper Nemanja Vidic returned against the Cottagers, Phil Jones played in midfield and Fabio is available, while Moyes has already indicated Rio Ferdinand is close to a return.

And with Sociedad seemingly in good form – they beat Osasuna 5-0 on Saturday – the Reds will need to be tight at the back to pick up three more Champions League points.

Who would you play in defence on Tuesday?

object.content:
Talking Point: Defence vs Sociedad

David Moyes has some thinking to do as he ponders the make-up of his defence for United’s next game, against Real Sociedad in the Champions League on Tuesday.

Rafael and Jonny Evans will need to be assessed after coming off injured at half-time against Fulham on Saturday. Evans was replaced by Chris Smalling, who performed admirably in the second period.

Skipper Nemanja Vidic returned against the Cottagers, Phil Jones played in midfield and Fabio is available, while Moyes has already indicated Rio Ferdinand is close to a return.

And with Sociedad seemingly in good form – they beat Osasuna 5-0 on Saturday – the Reds will need to be tight at the back to pick up three more Champions League points.

Who would you play in defence on Tuesday?

annotation: Play kagawa; he wants to leave in January.
